item.title: Everything about Data Access Layer
item.description: The most complete and best source about Data Access. Easy and visualized way to understand Collection {Array, ArrayList, HashTable, Stack, Queue, List, IList, IEnumerable, IQueryable, ICollection, Dictionary} , Entity Framework {CodeFirst , DatabaseFirst, ModelFirst} , ADO.NET { Command , Connection, DataReader, DataSet, DataTable, DataAdapter, DataView}, Linq { Linq2Sql, Linq2Collection, Linq2Array, Linq2XML } , Methods {Lambda Expression, Extension Methods, Partial Methods} especially for beginners. It has sample source code . I explained difficult part by the aid of so many pictures. Enjoy it .
item.author: Mahsa Hassankashi
